Acid Cloud

Essence Required
Creation
12

Details

  • Tier 1
  • Tier 2
  • Tier 3

Effects

Summon an Acid Cloud with a radius of 1 surrounding target hexagon, dealing 20 damage to any troop standing within or stepping inside. The damage will happen on cast, and then troops immediately within will not take damage again unless they are still within or re-enter the cloud the following round.

Duration

2 Rounds

Effects

Summon an Acid Cloud with a radius of 1 surrounding target hexagon, dealing 40 damage to any troop standing within or stepping inside. The damage will happen on cast, and then troops immediately within will not take damage again unless they are still within or re-enter the cloud the following round.

Duration

2 Rounds

Effects

Summon an Acid Cloud with a radius of 1 surrounding target hexagon, dealing 60 damage to any troop standing within or stepping inside. The damage will happen on cast, and then troops immediately within will not take damage again unless they are still within or re-enter the cloud the following round.

Duration

3 Rounds
